column7: Intermediate level of tap dance technique for non-dance majors. Course is a continuation of DANC 120, emphasizing a progression in movement vocabulary, style, rhythm, and performance quality. May be repeated to a maximum of 8 hours. Prerequisite: DANC 120 or equivalent, or consent of instructor.
column9: May be repeated to a maximum of 8 hours. Prerequisite: DANC 120 or equivalent, or consent of instructor.
column11: Written assignments and concert attendance is required.
